description: Last member of a sexy prime quadruple: value of p+18 such that p, p+6, p+12 and p+18 are all prime.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Sexy Primes.
mathematica: lst={};Do[p=Prime[n];If[PrimeQ[p+6]&&PrimeQ[p+12]&&PrimeQ[p+18], AppendTo[lst, p+18]], {n, 8!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 29 2008 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p+18: p in PrimesUpTo(30000) | IsPrime(p+6) and IsPrime(p+12) and IsPrime(p+18)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 07 2015
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Dec 11 1999
